connector.description:
Send data to Kafka topics on an insecure broker with Apicurio Registry.

The Kamelet is able to understand the following headers to be set:

- `key` / `ce-key`: as message key

- `partition-key` / `ce-partitionkey`: as message partition key

Both the headers are optional.

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-sink.topic
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: Comma separated list of Kafka topic names.

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-sink.bootstrapServers
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: Comma separated list of Kafka Broker URLs.

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-sink.valueSerializer
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: Serliazer class for value that implements the Serializer interface.

camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-not-secured-sink.avroDatumProvider
camel.kamelet.kafka-apicurio-registry-no.description: How to write data with Avro.
